<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Juggernaut Mutagen](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3318)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=528" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Elixir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=589" />
<trait label="Mutagen" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=808" />
<trait label="Polymorph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=670" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 289 <sup>1.1</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104))</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Your body becomes sturdy and ponderous. 

**Benefit** You gain an item bonus to Fortitude saves and the listed number of temporary Hit Points. Whenever you're at maximum Hit Points for at least 1 minute, you regain the temporary Hit Points. 

**Drawback** You take a –2 penalty to Will saves, Perception checks, and initiative rolls.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 1"
pfs="Standard"
>
Juggernaut Mutagen (Lesser)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 289 <sup>1.1</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 548 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 4 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The bonus is +1, you gain 5 temporary Hit Points, and the duration is 1 minute.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 3"
pfs="Standard"
>
Juggernaut Mutagen (Moderate)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 289 <sup>1.1</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 548 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 12 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The bonus is +2, you gain 10 temporary Hit Points, and the duration is 10 minutes.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 11"
pfs="Standard"
>
Juggernaut Mutagen (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 289 <sup>1.1</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 548 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 300 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The bonus is +3, you gain 30 temporary Hit Points, and the duration is 1 hour. When you roll a success on a Fortitude save, you get a critical success instead.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 17"
pfs="Standard"
>
Juggernaut Mutagen (Major)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 289 <sup>1.1</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 548 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 3,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The bonus is +4, you gain 45 temporary Hit Points, and the duration is 1 hour. When you roll a success on a Fortitude save, you get a critical success instead, and your critical failures on Fortitude saves become failures instead.
name: Juggernaut Mutagen
